sourceMeaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>canopy</radical> under which <radical>Wolverine</radical> is sipping some <radical>water</radical>. He looks so at <kanji>ease</kanji> and at <kanji>peace</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Wolverine just looks so peaceful under that canopy with his water.
readingMnemonic: Suddenly you realize that it's not just Wolverine, but also <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>. hanging out under the canopy.
readingInfo: <ja>こういち</ja> sees you and invites you to come sip water under the canopy. Why not? Looks peaceful.
